main.name: Charles Fayal
main.description: Passionate problem solver, entrepreneur, student, kite boarder, adventurer.
main.bio: I learned early on to work hard and to work smart. Whatever I am working on I love to pour myself into it. On that note, I have a strong work life balance that comes from great friends, good family, and an abundance of hobbies.
main.contactmessage: Interested in something I am doing? Send me a message!.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

work.title: Lead Advanced Software Engineer
work.description: Lead a team of 7 software engineers to build microservices and controllers for state observation and robotic fleet coordination.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Developed distributed real-time multi-agent controls software for robotic fleets of 100s of mobile robots. Our teams responsibilities included task assignment, routing, fleet control and optimization.

work.title: Lead Industrial Controls Engineer
work.description: Lead a team of 5 engineers and technicians to install, commission, and test industrial controls equipment and software. Worked with a variety of teams from construction to project management and engineers.

projects.title: Inspire Motivational Alarm
projects.category: An inspirational alarm clock on iOS and less so on Android

projects.title: Toast Club
projects.category: A subscription based app for bars to bring in more foot traffic by giving customers their first drink free.

testimonials.text: I worked with Charles on the System Controls team at Symbotic. When he joined the team, he was able to dive right in and start contributing to the most complex parts of the software. His wholistic system knowledge and eye for the big picture proved to be a valuable asset on our team. He is a great collaborator and took initiative to reach out across teams to promote innovative ideas. Charles is a hard worker, but also keeps the work environment fun and positive.
Charles Fayal #Kudos It's honestly hard to explain how integral you are to this team #TeamPlayer
